text: The Buddy Holly Story is 1978 American biographical movie about Buddy Holly and was directed by Steve Rash. It stars Gary Busey, Don Stroud, Charles Martin Smith, Conrad Janis, Maria Richwine and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It was nominated for three Oscars and won one Academy Award in 1979. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1978 drama movies Category:1970s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Steve Rash Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:Movies set in Manhattan Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Movies about singers Category:Movies based on biographies
title: The Buddy Holly Story
